channel.title: Comments on: Where is the option to change custom profile picture?

item.title: By: glitchaddiction12
item.dc:creator: glitchaddiction12
item.description: That’s weird I’m on the app and I have the option don’t know why it disappeared for you
item.content:encoded: That’s weird I’m on the app and I have the option don’t know why it disappeared for you

item.title: By: Sparda5221
item.dc:creator: Sparda5221
item.description: The only way I know how to change your picture to something custom is connecting your Facebook and changing your Facebook picture to what you want your avatar to be. I made a Facebook just to change my profile picture. I believe only your friends will be able to see this picture, but I could be wrong. Not sure if this is what you were looking for but just in case, there ya go!
item.content:encoded: The only way I know how to change your picture to something custom is connecting your Facebook and changing your Facebook picture to what you want your avatar to be. I made a Facebook just to change my profile picture. I believe only your friends will be able to see this picture, but I could be wrong. Not sure if this is what you were looking for but just in case, there ya go!

item.title: By: Satch1987
item.dc:creator: Satch1987
item.description: You have to do it in the official PS app not through the Sony website
item.content:encoded: You have to do it in the official PS app not through the Sony website
